metadata.title: VSDISPLAY HD-MI VGA DVI Audio LCD Driver Board for 15.4" LTN154BT03 LP154WP2 B154PW04 1440x900 LED 40Pin LCD Panel
features: Please be sure use 12V power adapter
B154PW04 V0 B154PW04 V1 B154PW04 V4 B154PW04 V6
Please feel free to contact us if you have any questions.
description: Compatible with lots of LCD panels (5.6~27inch) according to different LVDS cable and inverter board HD-MI+DVI+VGA+Audio lcd controller board work with LCD screen Operating voltage:10~24V DC (Recommened use 12V more than 2.5A power adapter) Keyboard function: ON/OFF MENU LEFT RIGHT EXIT/SELECT AUTO OSD Language: English, French, German, Italian, Spanish, Portuguese, Japanese, Korean (optional)

This board Compatible work with below lcd panel (Not list all of model No):  15.6inch 1400*900: B154PW04 V0 B154PW04 V1 B154PW04 V4 B154PW04 V6 B154PW04 V7 LTN154BT02-001 LTN154BT03-001 LP154WP2-TLA1 LP154WP2-TLA2 LP154WP2-TLA3 LP154WP2-TLA4 N154C6-L01
1× HD-MI+DVI+VGA+Audio lcd controller board 1× IPEX40Pin LVDS Cable 1× Keyboard with Wire
